articles.title: Scientists reveal a tiny brain chip that streams thoughts in real time
articles.description: BISC is an ultra-thin neural implant that creates a high-bandwidth wireless link between the brain and computers. articles.description: A man is facing murder charges after the fatal stabbing of a teenager in central Edmonton.
